categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Rorkys Hesh was a male Human Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. Wielding two lightsabers in combat, he was one of the commanders of the Republic forces on the planet Hoth.

Master Rorkys Hesh was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Strongholds, which added Conquest Commanders to most of the dual-faction worlds. Hesh is a rare NPC enemy, and his place at Outpost Zerek on Hoth is frequently occupied by a generic Veteran Jedi Battlemaster.
